product_name: National Book Network The Roadside Mountain Bike Maintenance Manual
long_description: A handy, lay-flat guide that covers everything from flats to tool-selection, The Roadside Mountain Bike Maintenance Manual offers quick fixes to keep you and your bike on the trail.
short_description: A handy, lay-flat guide that covers everything from flats to tool-selection, The Roadside Mountain Bike Maintenance Manual offers quick fixes to keep you and your bike on the trail.
